review: The room was clean and the staff was very helpful.
Breakfast was cold and the check-in process was slow.
Amazing view from the balcony, and excellent room service.
Room smelled bad and there was no hot water.
The food was delicious and the location was perfect.
Noisy at night and the AC didn’t work properly.
Very friendly staff and quick check-in.
The bathroom was dirty and the bed was uncomfortable.
Great experience overall, especially the spa and pool.
Average stay, nothing special.
Wi-Fi was fast and the concierge was helpful.
Elevator was broken and towels were not replaced daily.
Comfortable bed and tasty breakfast.
Long wait at reception and rude staff.

Exceptional service and beautiful interior design.
